name: Pokémon Final Red
overview: Story: Pokémon Final Red is a reborn of Pokémon Red, that includes a new whole story based on manga, anime and original game events. Language: Spanish Features: • The Physical / Special / Status split • New type icons • Pokémon from Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, Sinnoh, Unova, Kalos and Alola • New moves and cool move sets, with working effects and animations • New original items, including those in latest generations • Modern abilities • Two new types: Fairy and Sound, with a new type chart ovbiously • Updated Pokémon and Trainer sprites • Rock Climb and climbable walls • Dive and underwater maps • Headbutt and honey trees • New secret areas • Kanto completely remaked from zero • Wonder trade • Running Shoes can be used indoors • A bonus Premier Ball is given for every purchase of ten or more Poké Balls • Repellents give reuse prompts upon expiration • Experience Points are gained upon Pokémon capture • Exp Share works like VI Gen • Two types of tall grass with different types of pokémon in each one • Day Night System and Seasons • Achievements system (Ribbons and diplomes) • TV Based on the hour • Easter eggs • New menu • New gadget: the iPoké • Dynamic weather and events based on day • Technical Machine items are reusable • Field moves have faster animations • Ride on Pokémon in some areas • And a lot of new original stuff Known Bugs: • Recent caught Pokémon after III GEN appear as Zigzagoon, Sentret or Rattata, also they have Bulbasaur's cry • Eggs level up with Exp Share • Some Pokémon gives 1 XP • Some Pokémon are not catchable • Some Pokémon don't evolve the way they should • Some Pokémon movesets are messed up! • Evolve Foongus freezes the game • Some names aren't completely capitalized • Some battles in Sala Union don't happen again if you refresh the map • Pokémon Center's machine doesn't sells COFFEE • Cueva Puntaroca isn't complete, so is kinda buggy.. • You can't Rock Climb yet • Even if some NPC mentions that there are discounts, they don't happen yet • Tradable Evolution have been replaced for Evolution by Trade Stone • Magmar evolves leveling up if equiped with Magmatizer • Electabuzz evolves leveling up if equiped with Electrifier • Magneton evolves leveling up if equiped with Magnetizer • Nosepass evolves leveling up if equiped with Coronetite • Eevee evolves into Glaceon with Glace Stone • The items that have to be equiped to a Pokémon to evolve are in game, perhaps there's no way to acquire it but gameshark code
